body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Cages R Us. My name is William Martin. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ruth. How can I assist you today? Could you provide me with your phone number and email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - four four three - two one zero zero. My email address is ruth.diaz@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Ruth. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about our Batting Cages products or services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a couple of questions. How many locations does your company have, and are there any current promotions happening?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have three zero locations across the country, Ruth. Currently, we are running a promotion for our premium membership packages. Is there anything else you'd like to inquire about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ruth. Thank you for contacting us. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
